schema.description: Request to create a new correlation rule.

is_definitive.description: Whether a match on this rule definitively confirms identity.

name.description: Display name for the rule (1-255 characters).

normalize.description: Whether to normalize attribute values before comparison.

priority.description: Priority for rule evaluation order (lower = higher priority).

source_attribute.description: Source attribute to match against (1-255 characters).

target_attribute.description: Target attribute to match against (1-255 characters).

threshold.description: Minimum similarity threshold for fuzzy matching (0.0-1.0).

weight.description: Weight of this rule in the aggregate confidence score.

schema.title: CreateCorrelationRuleRequest
